name: Bill Carson
description: I’m genuinely seeking a serious loving relationship that may possibly even lead to marriage with a loving,romantic and affectionate man who is willing to love and be loved and will spoil and pamper me as much as i will ,my interests include most sports,movies,music,travelling,romantic night outs,candlelit dinners,walks along the beach,reading,socialising with friends,meeting new people,camping,weekends away,out door activities,nature,photography and quiet nights at home watching a movie with the man of my dreams.I also enjoy kissing,cuddling and sensual massages.
